titleInfo.title: The finite temperature phase transition in four flavour QCD on an 8×12 3 lattice

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Gavai, R.V., Gupta, S., Irbäck, A., Karsch, F., Meyer, S., Petersson, B., Satz, H. & Wyld, H.W. (1989). The finite temperature phase transition in four flavour QCD on an 8×12 3 lattice. Physics Letters, B, 232(4), 491-497. Elsevier BV. doi:10.1016/0370-2693(89)90447-4.
